overview: A serpentine day in the life of ten seemingly disparate women: a porn star, a flight attendant, a psychiatrist, a masseuse, a bartender, a pair of call girls, etc. All of them with one crucial thing in common. Trouble.
tagline: High Hopes, High Anxiety, High Heels.
cast: Carla Gugino|Adrianne Palicki|Connie Britton|Marley Shelton|Garcelle Beauvais
